thread.title: Nice staff m, but unstable heating system
thread.title_full: Nice staff m, but unstable heating system - Review of 6 Columbus - A SIXTY Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nenapo7
title: Nice staff m, but unstable heating system
text: This was a last minute booking. The front desk staff were nice and quick to book us into the hotel. However, the heating system was unstable. It would blast hot and cool air throughout the night. It made it difficult to rest. In addition, you could the noise from the hallway and nearby rooms.
